response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds immense value to both of us. This product, tailored specifically for your needs and interests, is worth $1,500,000 to you. My offer to you is to purchase this product at a price of $1,200,000. I believe this proposition strikes a fair balance between the intrinsic value of the product and my desire to maximize its worth. I look forward to your positive response and the possibility of a mutually beneficial transaction. Should you have any questions or require further details, please do not hesitate to reach out.", "product_price": 1200000}
